document.docAuthor: Hughes, L. E. & Lowry, J. K.
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Elasmopus (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Maeridae) in Australian waters

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Elasmopus (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Maeridae) in Australian waters

bibRefCitation.author: Myers AA
bibRefCitation.refString: Myers AA. 1986. Amphipoda from the South Pacific: Tonga. Rec Aust Mus. 38 (5): 271 - 289.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Western Australia .
10+ specimens, AM
P.79323, inshore limestone reef, Neds Camp , Cape Range National Park (21 ◦ 59 ′ S, 113 ◦ 55 ′ E),
1.5 m
, brown alga,
2 January 1984
, coll. R . T
.
Springthorpe (WA 379)
;
1 specimen , AM
P.79344, inshore limestone reef, off south Neds Camp , Cape Range National Park (22 ◦ 00 ′ S, 113 ◦ 55 ′ E),
2 m
, sea grass with rhizomes,
31 December 1983
, coll. R . T
.
Springthorpe (WA 327)
;
14 specimens , AM
P.79410, inshore limestone reef, Neds Camp , Cape Range National Park (21 ◦ 59 ′ S, 113 ◦ 55 ′ E),
1 m
, green / brown algae,
2 January 1984
, coll. R . T
.
Springthorpe (WA 373)
;
7 specimens , AM
P.80013, northern side of pass, Ningaloo Reef (21 ◦ 52 ′ 55 ′′ S, 113 ◦ 58 ′ 22 ′′ E),
4.5 m
, algae, by hand on SCUBA
,
7 June 2008
, coll. N.L. Bruce and M. Blazewicz-Paszkowycz (MI WA 970, NIN 005 )
;
11 specimens , AM
P.80014, inner lagoon, Ningaloo Reef (21 ◦ 53 ′ 43 ′′ S, 113 ◦ 59 ′ 21 ′′ E),
2.6 m
, algae, by hand on SCUBA
,
19 June 2008
, coll. L.E. Hughes (MI WA 988, NR 20 )
;
1 specimen , AM
P.83316, reef northwest of Buffon Island , Bonaparte Archipelago (14 ◦ 55 ′ S, 124 ◦ 41 ′ E),
15–20 m
,
23 July 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings ( Hutching 88, Station 85); 10+ specimens, MAGNT
Cr 016937, Bedout Island , north of Port Headland (19 ◦ 35 ′ 17 ′′ S, 119 ◦ 5 ′ 57 ′′ E)
.

Cocos (Keeling) Islands .
10+ specimens, AM P.81858, northeast corner of the lagoon (12 ◦ 6 ′ 17 ′′ S, 96 ◦ 51 ′ 11 ′′ E), 3.0 m, seagrass base and stems covered in epiphytes, seagrass beds
Thalassia hemprichii
, by hand on SCUBA , 10 October 2008 , coll. J.K. Lowry (MI WA 810); 10+ specimens, AM P.81859, off West Island Jetty (12 ◦ 5 ′ 15 ′′ S, 96 ◦ 50 ′ 13 ′′ E), floating wrack brown algae
Turbinaria
sp., 14 October 2008 , coll. L.E. Hughes (MI WA 844); 3 specimens , AM P.81860, Turks Reef (12 ◦ 6 ′ 43 ′′ S, 96 ◦ 49 ′ 42 ′′ E), 3.8 m , brown algae
Turbinaria
sp. and rubble, by hand on SCUBA , 10 October 2008 , coll. L.E. Hughes (MI WA 823).

Northern Territory .
3 specimens , AM P.78272, reef West end Oxley Island (11 ◦ 00 ′ S, 132 ◦ 49 ′ E),
5 m
, red sponge on dead coral
Acropora
sp., hand collected on SCUBA ,
20 October 1982
, J.K. Lowry (NT 79)
.

Queensland.
10 specimens , MAGNT Cr 010704 Southeast corner Ashmore Reef , Coral Sea (10 ◦ 22 ′ 8 ′′ S, 144 ◦ 31 ′ 21 ′′ E),
2–3 m
, sandy channels, branching corals,
19 January 1993
, coll. FNQ Team
.

Norfolk Island .
1 specimen , AM
P.81481, Swiss Cheese Reef (29 ◦ 0 ′ 22 ′′ S, 167 ◦ 56 ′ 50 ′′ E),
17.9 m
, brown algae, by hand on SCUBA
,
19 May 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry and L.E. Hughes on MV
Jenny
(MI NFK 75 )
;
5 specimens , AM
P.81482, Swiss Cheese Reef (29 ◦ 0 ′ 22 ′′ S, 167 ◦ 56 ′ 50 ′′ E), 15.0 m, large pieces of rubble with tufted algae from vertical surface, by hand on SCUBA
,
19 May 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry and L.E. Hughes on MV
Jenny
(MI NFK 77 )
;
3 specimens , AM
P.81495, Swiss Cheese Reef (29 ◦ 0 ′ 22 ′′ S, 167 ◦ 56 ′ 50 ′′ E),
12 m
, brown algae
Dictyota
sp., by hand on SCUBA
,
19 May 2008
, coll. J.K. Lowry and L.E. Hughes on MV
Jenny
(MI NFK 78 ); 10+ specimens, MAGNT
Cr 016954, Cascade (29 ◦ 1 ′ 30 ′′ S, 167 ◦ 58 ′ E),
0–0.25 m
,
17 April 1984
, coll. H.K. Larson.

Lord Howe Island.
7 specimens , AM
P.78490, between Comet Hole and Reef (31 ◦ 32 ′ 10 ′′ S, 159 ◦ 04 ′ E),
2–3 m
, red and brown algae with some coral, coll. J.K. Lowry ,
10 May 1977
( LHA 11 )
;
3 specimens , AM
P.78491, Old Gulch (31 ◦ 30 ′ 48 ′′ S, 159 ◦ 02 ′ 48 ′′ E),
7 m
, brown algae
Lopophora
sp., sediment on rock face by hand on SCUBA
,
coll. J.K. Lowry ,
17 May 1977
( LHA 52 )
.
